name: Notion Digital Business Kit
description: Starting an online business was never easier than now. In this Notion Digital Business Kit you will find everything you need to know and have as a successful digital business owner.So you are looking for the easiest way to start or manage your digital business. Well, this kit is designed exactly for you. No matter if your business will sell books, apps, courses or some other services you will find this kit extremely beneficial. This guide/management template kit will help your o start/manage you
features: Start Your Digital Business (for people who just starting their business); Grow Your Digital Business (for people who already running their business); Define Your Brand And Products (determine what to sell); Determine Market Viability and Conduct Product Research (is your product wanted?); Conduct Online Market Research (is this product already sold by someone?); Laws and Regulations (do your business legally); Target Market Analysis (what are your target customers?); A Few Quick Tips For Starting Out (I wish you good luck in starting your digital business); Elon Musk's Biggest Advice For Starting A Business (if I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants); Sell Your Product (12 online selling tips for people who are just starting out)
